name: prey-plugin-control-panel
description: The default. Lets you remotely track and control your device using the official Prey Control Panel.

protocol.message: Protocol to use. Either http or https.

send_status_info.message: Includes status info (battery info, logged user, etc) when checking in.

scan_hardware.message: Whether to send hardware information on boot, to detect any changes.

location_aware.message: Allows to keep location info updated, retrieving it on connection status changes.
